description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health


  • Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage based off of bonus Health.
  • Cleave: Attacks apply additional damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals damage to enemies behind the target.Titanic Crescent
    Empower your next Cleave to deal bonus physical damage On-Hit and deal bonus physical damage to enemies behind the target.
name: Titanic Hydra
